projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: A simple Pokedex to search information about your favourite Pokemon. This project was the assignement for the React Code Week given for the Edgemony Bootcamp. I used the RESTful PokeAPI, fetching and processing the data that i needed to populate the Pokedex page. I also used Recharts library to show the stats of each Pokemon.
